name: The Gentleman
description:
All asset made by Micah Goodhue (Whiteleaf Arts) in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 46.

Your little old grandma needs help crossing the--seemingly endless--street. It's your job to protect her from all the traffic! Punch all those pesky cars out of grandma's way. What a nice young man you are! Or should I say, what a **Gentleman** you are.

Use WASD to move, hold LMB to charge up your attack!
